targets.query: SELECT mean("upsAdvBatteryTemperature") * 9/5 + 32 FROM "snmp.UPS" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "agent_host", "agent_host" fill(none)

panels.description: 电池后备时间，切换为电池供电，才可查看对应时间
panels.title: 电池后备时间

panels.description: Indicates whether the UPS batteries need replacing.
panels.title: 电池状态
